level.heading: Restrictions on construction and projections on certain streets, parkways, boardwalks and beaches.
level.text: ยง 27-315 Restrictions on construction and projections on certain streets, parkways, boardwalks and beaches. Notwithstanding the foregoing provisions of this article, it shall be unlawful to build, erect, make areaways, steps or other projections prohibited by sections 19-131, 19-132, 19-135, 18-109, 18-112 and 18-113 of the code.
